org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1
Interface ResponseHandler<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileResponseHandler, XmlResponseHandler
public interface ResponseHandler<T>

Handles responses from Web Service calls

Author:
Jennifer Hickey, Greg Turnquist

Method Summary
 T getErrorResponse(ServiceError error)
          Generate an response object with the given Error.
 T handleResponse(int responseCode, org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase method)
          Handles the method response and creates a response object of the given class
 

Method Detail

getErrorResponse

T getErrorResponse(ServiceError error)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Generate an response object with the given Error. In some cases the HQ server will not give us a result, so we generate one ourselves. XXX: It would be nice here if we could get JAXB to generate an interface for all response objects so we don't need to use reflection here.

Parameters:
error - The ServiceError to include in the response
Returns:
A response object of the given type with the given service error.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If an error occurs generating the error object.

handleResponse

T handleResponse(int responseCode,
                 org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase method)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Handles the method response and creates a response object of the given class

Parameters:
responseCode - The status code from the Method execution
method - The method that was executed
Returns:
A response object of the given type
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is an error handling the response.
